abstract: One small change in the law could make Warren Buffett’s billion dollar bet on global equity markets look less like a winner.
snippet: One small change in the law could make Warren Buffett’s billion dollar bet on global equity markets look less like a winner.
lead_paragraph: One small change in the law could make Warren Buffett‘s billion dollar bet on global equity markets look less like a winner, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Buffett Gets in a Bind Over Options
